response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item holds a significant value to me, reflecting years of expertise and innovation. Given its worth to you, I propose we discuss a fair price that would allow us both to benefit from this transaction. Considering its intrinsic value and your anticipated use, I suggest we aim for a price closer to $12,000. I believe this offers a reasonable compromise that respects the product's value while being favorable to you. Let's schedule a call to delve deeper into this opportunity and explore if we can reach an agreement that satisfies both parties.", "product_price": 12000}
